channel.title: Literature on Lifemaker
channel.description: Recent content in Literature on Lifemaker

item.title: Who Am I
item.description: A Life is a conscious experiencer and doer in existence You and I are units of Life each. So is every human and animal on Earth which has a brain, nervous system, at least two senses and can learn and evolve within one lifetime. Animals don’t and generally can’t think about the nature of Self but humans can and they do. A human has full faculty to grasp the knowledge of Self and Existence and make good use of it.
